require "gmcphelper" dofile(GetInfo(60).."aardwolf_colors.lua")
capture_donations = tonumber(GetVariable("capture_donations")) or 1
require "checkplugin" function OnPluginListChanged() -- check we have necessary plugins do_plugin_check_now("3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264", "aard_GMCP_handler") do_plugin_check_now("dd10517422bc35b5131a3aa0", "VI_capture_buffers") end
function OnPluginConnect() Send_GMCP_Packet("gmcpchannels on") end
function OnPluginEnable() -- if we are connected when the plugin loads, it must have been reloaded while playing if IsConnected() then OnPluginConnect() end end
function OnPluginSaveState() SetVariable("did_init", did_init and "1" or "0") SetVariable("capture_donations", capture_donations) end
init_channel_names = { "pray", "remort_auction", "global_quest", "info", "raidinfo", "claninfo", "warfare", "advice", "answer", "auction", "barter", "cant", "claninfo", "clantalk", "curse", "debate", "dtell", "ftalk", "gametalk", "gclan", "gossip", "gratz", "group", "gsocial", "gtell", "helper", "immtalk", "lasertag", "ltalk", "mafiainfo", "market", "mchat", "mobsay", "music", "mxit", "newbie", "nobletalk", "pchat", "pokerinfo", "ptell", "question", "quote", "racetalk", "rauction", "rp", "say", "sports", "spouse", "tech", "tell", "tiertalk", "trivia", "wangrp", "wardrums" } did_init = (GetVariable("did_init")=="1")
function untagged_info(name, line, wildcards, styles) CallPlugin("dd10517422bc35b5131a3aa0", "stamp_and_store", name, line) end
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) -- Look for GMCP handler. if (id == '3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264') then if (text == "comm.channel") then res, gmcparg = CallPlugin("3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264","gmcpval","comm.channel") luastmt = "gmcpdata = " .. gmcparg assert (loadstring (luastmt or ""))()
msg = strip_colours(gmcpdata.msg or "") chan = gmcpdata.chan or "" if (capture_donations == 1 or string.match(msg, "^CLAN ANNOUNCEMENT: %a+ has donated") == nil) then CallPlugin("dd10517422bc35b5131a3aa0", "stamp_and_store", chan, msg) end end end end
function OnPluginInstall() if not did_init then did_init = true for i,v in ipairs(init_channel_names) do CallPlugin("dd10517422bc35b5131a3aa0", "add_buffer_if_new", v, true) -- don't reindex every time here, just do it once at the end end CallPlugin("dd10517422bc35b5131a3aa0", "reindex_buffers") OnPluginSaveState() end end
function init_channels() did_init = false OnPluginInstall() end
function show(...) print(...) -- replace this with TTS end
